website_summaries.verdict: Offers 12 different game modes to keep kids entertained over multiple sessions.
pros: A little smaller than some other options, making it good for tight spaces
Both front and rear areas can be adjusted to allow children of different heights to play

customer_reviews.title: DAVE N BUSTERS IN YOUR HOUSE!
customer_reviews.text: THIS ARCADE BASKETBALL GAME IS AWESOME! WE TURNED ONE ROOM INTO A GAME ROOM AND THIS IS THE BIGGEST HIT BY FAR. TAKES SOME PATIENCE TO ASSEMBLE BUT WORHT IT FOR SURE. I ALSO ADDED LED LIGHTS AROUND THE BACKBOARD FOR REAL ARCADE EXCITEMENT. MY BOYS LOVE IT AND SO DOES MOM AND DAD!
customer_reviews.author: Jen Horner

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for a company party and both of the scoreboards broke before it even started. I ordered them a week ago and we got about 15 minutes of use out of them. I wouldn’t recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: haylee

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: This item has been great so far. It did take a minute to put together. It will be a project to do. The light sensors do a pretty good job of counting your shots that you make. The instructions weren’t too bad to understand. It is quite tall so make sure you have high enough ceilings. Also it will b what’s to move once it’s together so follow the instructions in order because if I didn’t I wouldn’t have noticed that I had to move it to another room.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Athey

customer_reviews.title: Like arcade
customer_reviews.text: You need more sturdy tools like a racket wrench or sturdy wrench than what was supplied by Lifetime. Wasn’t too complicated to put together but did take some time—-sped up with use of my own tools. Game is larger than most I have seen and approaches size of arcade game. Much better for me and my adult children to play than the smaller competitors I’ve seen. My son and son-in-law play for hours. Fits in my high ceiling basement perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Charles R

customer_reviews.title: Sensors do not work properly
customer_reviews.text: My family and I were so excited to get this set up. However, once it was set up we were very disappointed that the sensors do not work properly as they only count about half of the baskets. After noticing this, I looked at other reviews and it seems like this is a common issue. I wish I would have read the reviews prior to purchasing. Would not recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble but not bad. A little tricky for one person, but manageable. The pieces are well labeled; the instructions are not good but about average. The structure is strong and well made. The backboard and goals are sturdy. The steel tubes and bolts are thick and built to last. All the pieces were there. The electronic basket counter works fine. From all the previous reviews, I don’t expect it to last long, but it’ll still be fun without. My 6YO and 8YO boys love this. It’s a lot of fun. Takes a good deal of space on the floor. When folded, it takes about half. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jim S

customer_reviews.title: Fun right out of the box!
customer_reviews.text: My kids are loving this! Really happy to finally have a double shot! We just set it up, so I can't comment on longevity, but the unit feels wells constructed. The baskets are sturdy. The electronics work great. The box came with 5 balls and I contacted a representative from LifeTime who said he would send it out today, no cost. Very easy and responsive customer service. Straightforward assembly, but if doing alone w/out a ratchet or drill, plan on 3 hours. With a ratchet or drill screwdriver it would go faster.
customer_reviews.author: Venus

customer_reviews.title: Great family fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present for family. By all accounts, it is getting thoroughly used and is a nice, sturdy piece of equipment.
customer_reviews.author: i.p. daly

customer_reviews.title: exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Three days now after assembly and this game has delivered a lot fun for family and friends here at Christmas time. It's about a three-hour assembly, have your own wrench or vise-grip handy to speed up the process. At purchase time, the main objective/question was: can this thing overwhelm the mesmerizing power of the screen--phone, computer, TV, video game. Yes it can. The iPhone can wait when it's Double Shot game time. Whether you're into basketball or not, no matter. There are enough games installed on this system to appeal to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Jeebie

customer_reviews.title: Everyone Loves This Game!
customer_reviews.text: This review is written after assembly and a few weeks of play. I am extremely pleased with this product. It is well made and everything working perfectly. Everyone that stops by the house cannot stop playing this game. We have an air hockey table, foosball table and ping pong table. This is the preferred play. Scoring is accurate and for the price, it is a very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: SpeedySpy

customer_reviews.title: I wish I'd ordered this years ago!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this as a Christmas gift for my son and after a year, it's still holding strong! We've thoroughly enjoyed playing this game as a family, my son plays with friends, plays by himself, and my husband and I have competed against each other, and played with our friends. It's great quality and we've not experienced any issues. I would absolutely buy this again, and wish I'd made the purchase sooner!
customer_reviews.author: Leadership Lady

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost
customer_reviews.text: We are thrilled with this purchase. We could have easily gone with a cheaper option, but we are really glad that we went with this one. It functions great, is a lot of fun, and is very sturdy. We also really love that it comes with six balls and that it tracks the balls with a sensor so it is much more accurate than other brands that we've seen before.
customer_reviews.author: koda

customer_reviews.title: Winner!!
customer_reviews.text: My grandkids love this! It was relatively easy to assemble and it's very sturdy. One or two can play at a time. Be aware that if you put it in a basement you will need some headroom - works well with 10 ft, 8 ft might be a little tight.
customer_reviews.author: K. L. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great for all ages
customer_reviews.text: Great basketball hoop. We have spent countless hours playing with this. There are so many different games and while set up took some time, it wasn’t that difficult. I do wish there was a convient on and off switch.
customer_reviews.author: RandomAccess

customer_reviews.title: Junk and impossible to build BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy! Missing parts, damaged pieces, impossible to build. It’s literally junk.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina Keane

customer_reviews.title: Very nice hard to put together
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and sturdy- very time consuming to put together especially if you try to use the tools provided.... that was the worst part, but once assembled it's great! We bought it for our 7 year old for Christmas and everyone loves it including grandparents who now want one. It's awesome
customer_reviews.author: CMcAlpine

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.text: The left side does not count baskets made and will sometimes count when they are not made. Disappointed customer.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Stovall

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Although it took about 3-4 hours to build this, once completed it is a very solid game. We have 2 boys ages 5 and 8, and although our 5 year old struggles to make the baskets, it is the perfect size for my 8 year old. My husband and I have spent countless hours playing with each other or the kids and really enjoy it. The different games make it fun to be competitive versus just shooting hoops. Everything is in working order, so fingers crossed, it stays like that for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: amlmom

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Christmas present for my boys
customer_reviews.text: Favorite Christmas present for my boys. Only wish it folded up against the wall a little easier like our l last popashot. Quality seems that will hold up better than our last one.
customer_reviews.author: MTC

customer_reviews.title: Nice item
customer_reviews.text: It takes about two hours with two people to put together it’s pretty self-explanatory the directions are well written we had no troubles I suggest using a socket and some wrenches instead of the tools provided it’ll speed your process up. It’s a large item we thought we put in the basement but it was too big you’ll need an extra 2 feet above the maximum height which I believe is 90 inches for the arc of your shot. The kids are enjoying it
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball hoop is the best. Lifetime sent me the whole pack of screws cause a couple where missing. It was sent over night. Great customer service. The basketball hoop is built very well. The games are fun. Great for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: My grandson has not quit playing it since xmas. ...
customer_reviews.text: My grandson has not quit playing it since xmas. Very well made. It only took 2 hours to put together not the 4 to 6 hours some people have said.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth L Webb

customer_reviews.title: Score board doesn't work anymore
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my kids' 7th birthday. It was fantastic until the scoreboard stopped working. I have replaced the batteries twice and nothing has happened. I don't know how to get in touch with the seller, but I would like to fix this b/c my kids really enjoyed it. Please help and I will change the star rating to a 5.
customer_reviews.author: Cat

customer_reviews.title: Very solid basketball hoop..Best Christmas present ever!
customer_reviews.text: My boys love it. It’s very sturdy and took about 2 hours to assemble. Directions were straight forward but I used my own tools rather then the cheap ones included. Get ready Hours of indoor fun!
customer_reviews.author: Chrismiss

customer_reviews.title: Grandkids Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my grandkids and they love it.hopefully they get many years of enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Hiller

customer_reviews.title: Assembly was awful
customer_reviews.text: Grandkids love this. The assembly was difficult I believe more because all the nuts and bolts fell out of the poor packaging. There were a few missing which made things even more frustrating. Also there were missing clips on the net.
customer_reviews.author: Tammey Marcure

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Fun for all ages. Maybe my son will get to pay with it soon, once grandpa and I finish our tournament. Comes in a lot of pieces though, so be prepared for some serious time assembling. The quality is great tough.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: So fun!
customer_reviews.text: This is way bigger than I thought and took a way longer than I expected to build but it was worth it! Very very fun. I don’t have kids but me and my wife go to the arcade and she always beats me at this game. So I figured I would get her one and she loves it a lot!! We play it all the time and contest each other for different chores haha. Only con is that it randomly comes on and starts talking
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 👍
customer_reviews.text: Takes a bit to assemble but after the many many hours we have on this it was worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Josh J.

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun but takes up a lot of space
customer_reviews.text: Kids got this for Christmas. So far is lots of fun and has different game options. Took awhile to assemble. Notice the measurements! This goes all the way to our 8ft ceiling and is very large. Does fold up some but takes up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my teenage son and not only do his friends like it but our five and eight-year-old and me and my husband also enjoy it. Very sturdy construction. My five-year-old has tried a couple times laying in the sling and luckily it hasn’t broke.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Rosentreter

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Whole family Loves it! Assembly wasn’t too bad. Just be patient and read directions. I wouldn’t say hard to assemble just took about 2 hours
customer_reviews.author: Baseball2018

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 13 year old grandson for Christmans...he loves it!..Durable and sturdy. The 16 year old and his friends also love it!
customer_reviews.author: Daiva

customer_reviews.title: Basket counter
customer_reviews.text: One of the counters that are plugged into the back doesn’t work
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great family Game! Great Quailty
customer_reviews.text: Amazing family game! Install wasn’t the simplest but is anything really? Counts 100% accurate from what we have experienced! Love It!!
customer_reviews.author: Billy t.

customer_reviews.title: Fun sturdy basketball hoops. Everyone likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Fun basketball net for kids and adults sturdy, lots of options for games. However had to electric tape the control as it kept falling of mount, not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Angel -n- Taz

customer_reviews.title: Great, easy to assemble, solid construction, reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Easy to assemble, solid construction, no issues whatsoever. Used daily for about 7 weeks now.
customer_reviews.author: vanv

customer_reviews.title: Quality Made Item that hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for home game room. The grands played it non-stop for about three hours. It is the first thing they want to do when they drop by. Highly reccomend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Vendocola

customer_reviews.title: Good product, bring your patience
customer_reviews.text: We got this for Christmas, but it was too much to put together at the last minute on Christmas Eve. It wasn't easy to put together (it wasn't intuitive) and we had to request the services of someone who loves putting things together. We've had it four months and it's still working well. We haven't stored it for any reason, so not sure how reliable it is if you move it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: T. Glass

customer_reviews.title: Fun!
customer_reviews.text: So fun. Love the different games you can play. Keeps my kids (and husband) entertained for hours!
customer_reviews.author: R.P.

customer_reviews.title: I put this together in 2. 5 hrs using ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together in 2.5 hrs using the busted tools included and 3 rum & coke's! How could it take anyone more than 4 hours to put this together?!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Senecal

customer_reviews.title: Hours of Fun!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!...we love it. I play with adult friends more than my 3 boys play. The kids love it too...Very sturdy and fun to play. It really is like having an arcade in your house. Ignore bad reviews everyone. It is fun. Buy it, keep your kids active.
customer_reviews.author: James Wood

customer_reviews.title: not durable
customer_reviews.text: I built it and had it in garage. Took it outside for one event. The wind blew it over and the backboard broke. Now have a fully broken backboard. The pressed board not worth the money I spent on it, to fall over so easily.
customer_reviews.author: Ronny

customer_reviews.title: Quality construction
customer_reviews.text: Very solid construction, Good instructions, multitude of games which are easy to use. The ability to fold it up is great but wish it had locking clips on both sides instead of just one.
customer_reviews.author: Martina Bockenstedt

customer_reviews.title: Sensors don’t work on one side.
customer_reviews.text: I just put it together and sensors on one side don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Bogey333

customer_reviews.title: Well built & fun!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for 6 year old grandson was a great hit! Fun for children of all ages, as well as adults. Electronic scoring makes keeping score a breeze. Double baskets allow numerous games to be played. Assembly took 2 people about 6 hours. Unit snaps apart for easy transport, as well as folds for storage. Overall, excellent product with a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Debbie B.

customer_reviews.title: The Unit is Stronger than Superman!!! Able to withstand my kids!
customer_reviews.text: The unit took a few hours to put together, but nothing in the marketplace compares to the overall strength of this basketball unit. I have had several different units manufactured by other companies, but nothing compares!!!
customer_reviews.author: BHB

customer_reviews.title: Solid system - hours of fun
customer_reviews.text: Solid system - hours of fun - took 2 hours to put together but worth it.
customer_reviews.author: asapap

customer_reviews.title: Setup is not easy
customer_reviews.text: It's great once it's put together but it's a big job. Quality is pretty good.
customer_reviews.author: Nesshal

customer_reviews.title: This is a sturdy decent pop a shot
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy decent pop a shot. The games don’t work though. It constantly resets a few baskets in.
customer_reviews.author: mamagarcia

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to our game room. Gets lots of use by everyone
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Takes awhile to put together. You need two people to do so. Once its done. You will get lots of use.
customer_reviews.author: VH

customer_reviews.title: Well Built Hoops!
customer_reviews.text: It took some time to build but all worth it! Bought and build for my nephews for Christmas and boy they both loved it! We all enjoyed playing hoops! Every Features works pretty well. Steady and well built. Rock On!
customer_reviews.author: Aj

customer_reviews.title: Very solid!
customer_reviews.text: This product is very sturdy. Ours is used in a small commercial setting.
customer_reviews.author: David M. DeVries

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: So much fun, very sturdy well worth the price! Be cautious of how you plug the wires into the scoreboard, it’s very easy to reverse them causing it not to work.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Fields

customer_reviews.title: Very fun!
customer_reviews.text: Very fun and durable game. Adults have fun with this too!
customer_reviews.author: cncworker

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product although one ball arrived that appears to have a hole in it! Over all though satisfied
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Slam Dunk - but don't do it on this hoop
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Very sturdy, feels strong and not cheap. Setup was not nearly as bad as people make it sound on here. Finally something to take kids away from the screen!
customer_reviews.author: CB Jack

customer_reviews.title: Purchased an Open Bike Item.  Well worthit!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my 10 year old son who absolutely loves it. We bought as an open box item and all the parts were there and the cost was great!
customer_reviews.author: Laura Taylor

customer_reviews.title: So Many Competitions to Choose From!
customer_reviews.text: This basketball game is so much fun for our 5 & 10 year old boys. The adults also enjoy the many game options. If you don’t want to compete, just practice shooting. It’s addicting!
customer_reviews.author: JAG

customer_reviews.title: Fun for every age
customer_reviews.text: It was outstanding. Fun for every age! It took 6 hours to put it together but was well worth it when finished!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Mangiaracina

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun fun
customer_reviews.text: This product is excellent quality. Our family has been having so much fun together with it.
customer_reviews.author: Brad N

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. It did take quite awhile to put ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It did take quite awhile to put together. Probably 4 hours for my husband and dad together. One of the sensors for the hoop doesn't work correctly, as it only counts like every other shot made, which can get discouraging. Need to contact Lifetime to try and get a new sensor. Otherwise, this is a big, fun load of basketball!
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Fun for whole family.
customer_reviews.text: Exceeds expectations. Very sturdy and whole family enjoyed. Item is large, reaches ceiling. Needs to be set up in game room, but we measured and my son's twin bed with frame and mattress will fit under it- so it is going in the bedroom for awhile. Takes approximately 4 hours to put together with two people who are good at reading directions. Directions were complicated.
customer_reviews.author: Carter Davis

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game. My kids put down the video games ...
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game. My kids put down the video games to play more active games like this! Good value.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Gettle

customer_reviews.title: Top notch
customer_reviews.text: Solid. No missed shots. Expect to last for years. Would buy again. No design elements that I'd work on. In my basement with 9' ceilings and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Northof100

customer_reviews.title: Kids love it with great quality
customer_reviews.text: Kids love it with great quality. The pins when you lift it up could be better. You have to be very careful when you lift it up for storage.
customer_reviews.author: shaun straus

customer_reviews.title: You have to screw the nuts REALLY hard. Takes a strong wife to do this 😏👊🏻
customer_reviews.text: My 16 and 11 year old boys absolutely love this. Really good quality. I researched all the models and this came out top. Totally agree!! Really stable, sturdy construction and pretty easy to assemble with the instructions.
customer_reviews.author: M. Davies

customer_reviews.title: Its BIG... but its BIG FUN...
customer_reviews.text: Great, FUN product. It is large and a project to assemble... but it is official. Nice variety of games. I had a slight issue with something (my fault) and customer service was EXTREMELY helpful. Because of how I use this, I will probably purchase another one eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Sean D Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: The hoop is everything I expected really will help during the winter months
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product, well made, easy to assemble and lots of fun
customer_reviews.author: Joseph T Morandi DO

customer_reviews.title: Stop reading reviews - this is the b-ball arcade to buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is the basketball arcade to buy! It has some details I was looking for. A rod that runs through the fabric at the top behind the basket to keep fabric from sagging. Durable coated frame. Two (not just the one) infra-red sensors to correctly count each basket (doesn’t miscount like the regular dual-shot ones do). This one has details of overall better quality than the other comparable ones, even the other lifetime one. I’m surprised it doesn’t have more buys/reviews because this is the best one out there! Totally worth every penny! Has been played a ton since we bought it and we can’t get enough of it. Took some time to build it.
customer_reviews.author: Derek & Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Good buy!!
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great addition to our family. I waited 6 months to do the review and can say that we are very happy with it. I have 2 boys who are very hard on everything and it has held up well. I like that you can adjust the volume of the games and there are tons of fun games to play. My husband and I enjoy playing it too.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Large and fun
customer_reviews.text: Our family is having fun playing with this. It’s much larger than I imagined so lucky it fits our high ceilings in our game room. There’s no divider where basketballs come down to shoot so hands do get hit with those basketballs when playing a fast game.
customer_reviews.author: ERIN W

customer_reviews.title: Super fun!
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present for my son. Reviews said it was difficult to put together, we didn’t find this to be the case, however it did take a good 2 hours to put together
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie

product_meta.title: Lifetime 90648 Double Shot Deluxe Indoor Basketball Hoop Arcade Game
product_meta.description: Test your skills on a heavy-duty double shot arcade Basketball system from Lifetime products. Constructed of heavy-duty 18 gauge Powder-Coated steel, The Lifetime double shot is durable, rust-resistant, and will not crack, chip, or peel. The system has been programed with 4 new games for single players, 4 new games for two players, and 4 new games for multiple players - enjoy 12 new games with your family and friends! The nylon ramp has adjustable straps and buckles and unlike many systems, It will not fray or sag over time. The convenient ramp design folds up and secures in place with locking pins, providing safe, out-of-the-way storage. With infrared optical scoring and fun sound effects, The double shot is sure to create a fun arcade atmosphere, providing your family with years of excitement and fun. Overall height can be adjusted to 90 or 84 to match up with your ceiling height. The front lower Bar can be adjusted to 35 , 31. 5 , or 28 depending on the size of the person playing. The game controller is located in a conveniently accessible area on the front lower Bar.
feature_bullets: New improved infrared scoring sensors provide fast and accurate scoring
Game Room Essential - Includes 12 different game options with front mounted controller to easily switch between games
Easily Adjustable Height Frame in Front and Back; Convenient Fold-Up Design for Safe, Easy Storage
Upgraded digital Scoreboard With triple digit scoring for the over achievers
Six high-quality mini-basketballs and pump included. Backboard materials: medium-density fiberboard (MDF)
Electronic Buzzers and Sound Effects Create a Fun Arcade Atmosphere. Uses Standard AC Electrical Outlet - Also Compatible with (4) AA Batteries
Bring this challenging indoor basketball game home for years of fun!
